Package functions

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • functions.Utilities
  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class, with some helper methods used in a lot of other classes in the functions package
    Author:
    Jonathan Brose

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private Utilities()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String checkDouble​(double d)
      Checks whether the param d is a int factor of PI, for example: returns 2pi instead 6,2...
      static double parseDouble​(java.lang.String text)
      Parses a String to a double.
      static double parseDouble​(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Reads a double out of a TextField. "," becomes "
      static double round​(double value, int decimals)
      Rounds the value to the given decimals.
      static void showDialog​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message)
      Shows a dialog with the given title and message.

    • Method Detail

      • checkDouble

        public static java.lang.String checkDouble​(double d)
        Checks whether the param d is a int factor of PI, for example: returns 2pi instead 6,2...
        Parameters:
        d - double to be checked and converted to String
        Returns:
        converted value

      • parseDouble

        public static double parseDouble​(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
                          throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Reads a double out of a TextField. "," becomes ".", so 1,2 can be a valid input. Fractions are getting calculated and stored in the output.
        Parameters:
        textField - input TextField
        Returns:
        the parsed double.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the String is not valid for parseDouble(String).

      • parseDouble

        public static double parseDouble​(java.lang.String text)
                          throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Parses a String to a double. "Pi" or "e" will be replaced by the matching values from the Math class.
        Parameters:
        text - to be parsed.
        Returns:
        parsed double
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the String is not valid for parseDouble(String).

      • showDialog

        public static void showDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message)
        Shows a dialog with the given title and message.
        Parameters:
        title - title
        message - message

      • round

        public static double round​(double value,
                           int decimals)
        Rounds the value to the given decimals.
        Parameters:
        value - value to be rounded.
        decimals - count to how many decimals the method should round
        Returns:
        rounded value
